Lucian.name: LucianБ
Lucian.title: Бthe PurifierБ
Lucian.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБLucian wields relic weapons imbued with ancient power and stands a stalwart guardian against the undead. His cold conviction never wavers, even in the face of the maddening horrors he destroys beneath his hail of purifying fire. Lucian walks alone on a grim mission: to purge the spirits of those ensnared in undeath, his eternal beloved among them.БяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзLike the twin relic weapons they wielded, Lucian and his wife Senna were carved from the same stone. Together they battled evil in Runeterra for years, bringing light to darkness and purging those taken by corruption. They were beacons of righteousness: Senna's dedication to their cause never faltered, while Lucian's kindness and warmth touched the hearts of the many lives they saved. Two parts of one whole, they were devoted and inseparable.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзThough Lucian and Senna witnessed terror that would break most warriors, nothing they had seen compared to the horrors wrought by the Shadow Isles. When the spectral denizens of that accursed place began to manifest across Runeterra, Lucian and Senna hunted them down wherever they appeared. It was grim work, but the fearless pair prevailed until one tragic encounter with the soul-collector Thresh. Lucian and Senna had faced such nightmarish undead before, but never one so deviously clever and cruel. As the terrible battle unfolded, Thresh sprung an unexpected ploy. To Lucian's horror, the creature tricked Senna and ensnared her soul, trapping her in a spectral prison. Nothing could bring her back. Senna was lost, and for the first time, Lucian faced his mission alone. зЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфThough the Warden had taken half of Lucian's heart, he had also created the Shadow Isles' most dangerous foe. Lucian became a man of dark determination, one who would stop at nothing to purge the undead from the face of Runeterra. In honor of Senna's memory, he took up her fallen weapon and vowed to see their mission through to the end. Now wielding both relic weapons, Lucian fights to slay the undead and cleanse the souls of the Shadow Isles. He knows that Senna's soul is lost, but never loses hope that one day he will bring her peace. ЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖж''Be grateful. By slaying you now, I spare you an eternity of torment.'' ЖдДгГбБ
Б -- LucianБ
Lucian.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБLucian wields relic weapons imbued with ancient power and stands a stalwart guardian against the undead. His cold conviction never wavers, even in the face of the maddening horrors he destroys beneath his hail of ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжFor optimal burst, try to combine Relentless Pursuit into Piercing Light.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзArdent Blaze actually explodes in a star pattern. Try to line it up so the spokes hit enemy champions.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗOnce you have chosen an angle for The Culling, you cannot change it. Pick your moment well!ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзBecause of Lightslinger, Lucian benefits more from Attack Damage than he does from Attack Speed.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдLucian has strong burst, but little sustained damage.ДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзLucian cannot change the aim of The Culling. Take advantage of this by avoiding the angle of the bullets.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпPiercing Light does not give Lucian extra Attack Range. He still needs to find a target in range to line up his shot. Avoid Piercing Light by anticipating the angle Lucian will choose.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбPiercing LightБ
spells.description: БбГгДдLucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.ДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжShoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}БбГгДдЖ% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. Deals 75% damage to minions.ЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БArdent BlazeБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙLucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдЖжЗзFires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals зЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }})БбГг magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.ДгГбБ

БбГгDamaging marked targets grants Lucian гГбБ{{ e2 }}БбГ Movement Speed for 2 seconds.ГбБ

spells.name: БбRelentless PursuitбБ
spells.description: БбГгДдLucian dashes a short distance, removing all slow effects.дДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДDashes a short distance, removing all slow effects.ДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжIf The Culling kills an enemy champion, the cooldown of Relentless Pursuit is reset.ЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БThe CullingБ
spells.description: БбГгДдLucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.ДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгДдLucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for ЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }}БбГгДдЖ seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do ЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }})БбГгДдЖж physical damage. The number of shots scales with his Attack Speed. Total over жЖдДгГбБ{{ f2 }}Б shots: Б{{ f1 }}БбГгДд physical damage. The Culling does 400% damage to minions.дДгГбБ

БбГгДдLucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.ДгГбБ

БбГгReactivate The Culling to cancel early.гГбБ

passive.name: БLightslingerБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖWhenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.ЖдДгГбБ
